data.eml:eml: Review of the tribe Helconini Foerster s. s. from China, with the description of 18 new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yan, Cheng-Jin, Achterberg, Cornelis Van, He, Jun-Hua, Chen, Xue-Xin (2017): Review of the tribe Helconini Foerster s. s. from China, with the description of 18 new species. Zootaxa 4291 (3): 401-457, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4291.3.1
